required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase Ib of Recombinant Human Albumin Injection
clinical_study.official_title: Phase Ib Study of Recombinant Human Albumin Injection for the Treatment of Ascites in Patients With Hepatic Cirrhosis

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Hospital of Jilin University

clinical_study.source: The First Hospital of Jilin University

brief_summary.textblock: A Randomized, Multicenter,Open-label, positive-controlled, Multi-dose Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerance,Efficacy, Pharmacokinetics and Immunogenicity of recombinant human albumin injection in Patients With Hepatic Cirrhosis

detailed_description.textblock: This study was to evaluate the safety, tolerability,efficacy, pharmacokinetics and immunogenicity of recombinant human albumin injection in Patients With Hepatic Cirrhosis. The study design consists of two phases: Screening and treatment phase(dose increasing stage).Following the Screening phase, all eligible subjects will be randomized to receive recombinant human albumin injection or HumanAlbumin, study medication in a 3:1 ratio.Dose increasing stage (including 3 dose groups with increasing dose, and each group was set with HumanAlbumin control).The initial dose was 10g. The highest dose group was set at 30g.

primary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: Major efficacy character: Albumin concentration change
secondary_outcome.description: Albumin concentration change from baseline to Day 14（approximately，After the treatment）
Ascites regression rate from baseline at Day 14（approximately，After the treatment）
Change of abdominal circumference from baseline at Day 14（approximately，After the treatment）
Change of Weight from baseline at Day 14（approximately，After the treatment）
Plasma colloidal osmotic pressure change from baseline
Maximum Plasma Concentration（Cmax）of ALB as Recombinant Human Albumin administration occur
Time to Maximum Plasma Concentration（Tmax）of ALB as Recombinant Human Albumin administration occur
Half life (t1/2）as Recombinant Human Albumin administration occur
Area under the curve(AUC) as Recombinant Human Albumin administration occur
Percentage of patients with positive reaction against human albumin

arm_group.description: Participants received Recombinant Human Albumin Injection 10g/d
Participants received Recombinant Human Albumin Injection 20g/d
Participants received Recombinant Human Albumin Injection 30g/d

intervention.description: Participants will receive Recombinant Human Albumin Injection of intravenous infusion
intervention.other_name: Intravenous infusion of human albumin injection

intervention.description: Participants will receive HumanAlbumin of intravenous infusion
intervention.other_name: Intravenous infusion of recombinant human albumin injection

overall_official.affiliation: The first affiliated hospital of Jilin University

facility.name: the first hospital of Jilin University
